attributes.title: absolutely not
attributes.review: this app is a waste of storage. it took a WEEK to download just to hack and send my data to the government!! how dare trump think he can create a app to get rid of our american freedom and violate our privacy?! anyway, BYEDON 2020💖🧚‍♀️😻

This App is a virus in itself.... as soon as I opened it I was plagued with Fake Tans Fake people Fake promises... also why is someone in orange face all the time? Seems like someone spent too much time on mars but hey I guess that would explain a lot....

attributes.title: ✨Trump 2020✨but on a gravestone 🤩👑

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: I had to wait weeks for this to download all for it to crash when I opened it. I don’t even care anymore. You sir do not have my support

attributes.title: They all know
attributes.review:
I hate Donald, this app is terrible asking you for all of you information. He’s really believes that people visit this app to help him no WE NEED TO BRING HIM DOWN NOOOOOWWWW. This made me feel really go about myself 👁👃👁✊💪🥰😌🥳

attributes.title: Caused bad anal problems
attributes.review: I downloaded it and after 2 days crying tears of joy from looking at his campaign adds and craving Cheetos I started ejecting gold fish out of my anus. Bad experience 1/10 wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.title: Gen Z
attributes.review: So I wanted to support our wonderful orange and his little Cheeto but I am afraid that I can’t bare to see a rapist, racist, sexist, homophobic, and a very salty dude to even be out in public and not in jail so I don’t think this app or his campaign even be a thing.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app is not user friendly whatsoever. The information provided is broad and unclear. In addition, it’s loaded with spam and ads. I would not recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: To much lag
attributes.review: So when I opened the app I typed in what I had to then I lagged and I had to start all over ugh 😫 I also think there might be bug because it logs me out of the app

attributes.title: HORIBBLE TAKE IT OFF THE APP STORE
attributes.review: dont get this app it stole my fridge yesterday and squirted bbq sauce on my bed my dog licked it off but then the fbi came and broke my hair bone and took away all my socks and pooped in my toilet and broke it then the elephants came from Jupiter and got the app then died shortly after.
